first_translate: right before I was sucked into the darkness,
I managed  to stop myself from being pulled in...
even if only for just one moment.
does this mean that...
...I can control the shadows?
but then another question arises.

hangle: 원작의 피오나는 어둠을 통제할 수 없었다.
first_translate: fiona wasn’t able to control them in the original story.
then why did I succeed when she didn’t?
after all, we have the same body and talent.
it’s no use thinking about it too much since there are no answers anyway.
my head hurts so badly right now.
mm! I’m stuffed!
lord relton must’ve been very grateful toward you...
...for him to serve us such delicious food like this.
indeed.
hmm...
is something wrong?
you haven’t eaten much today either.
I’m glad I came here as part of the delegation.
really? why is that?
well, because I gained quite a lot out of coming here.
the people at the academy were nicer than expected.

hangle: 그 사람들, 목숨 빚을 졌다고 생각하고 있으니까…
first_translate: and they think they owe me their lives,

hangle: 나중에 분명 호의적인 태도를 보일 거야.
first_translate: so they’ll definitely treat me favorably later on.
on top of that,
I realized that I’m more amazing than I thought.
I controlled the shadows even though it was difficult.
that will surely help greatly during future shadow attacks.

hangle: 분명 어둠 토벌에 엄청난 도움이 될 거야.
first_translate: do you plan on getting involved with the shadows again?
of course!
of course!
fiona.
fiona!
she looked ice-cold,
as if her whole world had come crashing down around her.
there’s no need to try helping me.
while I don’t expect you to rejoice over what happened,
at least some congratulations would be nice.
why not?
promise me...
...that you won’t ever act like that again.
not only does it make no sense, but it’s also reckless.
still, I know my actions weren’t wrong.
I understand your point,
but I still feel responsible for everything that happened back there.
I was in charge after all.
I believe I made the best decision possible under those circumstances.
yes, actually, you’re absolutely right.
you’re our greatest asset.

hangle: 가끔은 생존을 우선시해야 할 때가 있어.
first_translate: there comes a time where survival takes precedence above anything else.

hangle: 그리고 어둠에 대한 정보는 너한테도 도움이 되잖아.
first_translate: and information regarding the shadows could prove useful to you as well.
that’s how I felt while fighting against them.
but--
like I said,
stop trying to help me already...!

hangle: 억지를 써서라도 너를 잃고 싶지 않아…
first_translate: I’d rather die than lose you...
siegren...
if you’re annoyed, instead of nagging me,
just get angry!
y-you idiot!
wait, fiona!
go away!
don’t follow me!
no, wait...
uh... um...
or maybe bring her cookies or something.
this isn’t going to work. I barely have any experience soothing ladies’ feelings.
how old do you think I am?
forget about that and go ahead without me.
what are you doing following me?

hangle: 네가 울면서 창고로 도망치는데 어떻게 그냥 가나.
first_translate: how could I leave you crying alone in the storage room?

hangle: 그런 소리를 다 할 줄 아네.
first_translate: look who knows exactly what to say.
...got into a fight with siegren.
it has something to do with the shadows, doesn’t it?

hangle: 맞아. 내 행동은 충분히 옳았다고 생각하는데.
first_translate: yeah. I really think I acted appropriately,

hangle: 시그렌이 괜히 말을 밉게 하는 거야.
first_translate: but siegren keeps saying things that hurt my feelings.
I know he’s worried about me,
I want to wipe away her tears...
no,
I shouldn’t do that...
fiona haelon.
you’re a good girl.
although you may be somewhat rash, you take responsibility for yourself.

hangle: 내 생각에도 네 판단이 객관적으로 옳았다.
first_translate: I agree that your judgment call was objectively correct.

hangle: 그러니 시그렌이 뭐라고 했든 별로 신경 쓰지 않았으면 좋겠어.
first_translate: thus, regardless of whatever siegren says, please don’t let his words bother you.
you deserve better than someone whose opinions sway yours so easily.
you deserve better than someone whose opinions sway yours so easily.
